member.name: M:Sitecore.Xdb.Processing.Queue.IAsyncProcessingPool`1.CheckOutAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously checks out a single work item from the current processing pool.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. When the task completes, the task result contains the work item checked out; or null if there are no work items available in the processing pool.
member.remarks: This method selects a work item from the processing pool and locks it exclusively for a period of time. For this time period, no other check out operation will return the same work item.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Xdb.Processing.Queue.IAsyncProcessingPool`1.CheckOutAsync(System.Int16)
member.summary: Asynchronously checks out a batch of work items from the current processing pool.
member.param: The maximum number of work items to check out.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. When the task completes, the task result contains a objects containing the work items checked out.
member.remarks: This method selects the requested number of work items from the processing pool and locks them exclusively for a period of time. The number of objects returned may be less than the specified batch size if there are not enough items available in the processing pool.
member.exception: Argument is less than 1 (one).

member.summary: Gets the earliest point in time at which the work item may be checked out from the processing pool.
member.value: A value that represents the earliest point in time, specified in UTC, at which the work item may be checked out from the processing pool.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.Processing.Queue.WorkItem.Attempts
member.summary: Gets the number of times the current work item was checked out (number of processing attempts).
member.value: A value that indicates how many times the current work item was checked out. The initial value is zero, and the value is increased at the beginning of each processing attempt.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.Processing.Queue.WorkItem.Properties
member.summary: Gets a dictionary containing key-value pairs of values that were specified with the current work item.
member.value: A of values that contain properties specified with the current work item.
member.remarks: Properties specified with the work item are available during the entire life-cycle of the work item. They can be used to specify contextual information useful during processing that is not contained within the work item itself.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.Processing.Queue.WorkItem.Status
